EmailTemplate.name: Initial Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Initial Report
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}, Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business services needs. In regard to your inquiry, LegalZoom can assist you to file the Initial Report for your [Corporation/LLC] and make the process easy for you. LegalZoom will prepare and file your entity's Initial Report with the Secretary of State on your behalf. It is important to file the Initial Report for your company to maintain its good standing with the Secretary of State. For your convenience, I have provided a summary of the fees below and the link to get started. INITIAL REPORT Standard Package | $35.00 + state fee + shipping (20-35 business days) Rush Report Package | $55.00 + state fee + shipping (7-10 business days) TO GET STARTED: http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/initial-reports.html Please feel free to contact us at (888) 381-8758 if you have any further questions. Our Business Formations Team business hours are {!snippetVariable.bizbsi_hours}. Best regards, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title}
{!User.CompanyName}
{!User.Address}
{!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension} This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717. Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book. This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email} Â© LegalZoom.com, Inc. All rights reserved.
